1.title: Let's Go! Valtryek!
1.plot: Passionate Blader Valt faces a familiar face in his first match of the District Tournament.

2.title: Kerbeus: Guard Dog of the Underworld!
2.plot: Valt is the talk of the school after his first round victory, but can he find his humility in time to battle his second round opponent?

3.title: Blast-Off! Rush Launch!
3.plot: Valt faces off against a puppet master while trying to perfect his Rush Launch.

4.title: Beyblade Club: Let's Get Started!
4.plot: Principal Shinoda grants Valt permission to start a Beyblade Club at school, but Valt finds that recruiting members is harder than he thought.

5.title: Into the Darkness! Dark Doomscizor
5.plot: A new Blader uses underhanded methods to rattle Valt's confidence before their official tournament battle.

6.title: Get Ready! Crash Course!
6.plot: Members of the Beyblade Club help Valt overcome his Rush Launch's greatest vulnerability.

7.title: The Flash Launch! It's Crazy Fast!
7.plot: Valt discovers a new launch which he names flash launch . At first it was Shu who understood that Valt changed the angle of launch as he got hit by a basketball. He was over delighted when he knew that flash launch is more powerful than rush launch although he was unable to control it.

8.title: A Powerful Opponent! Hyper Horusood!
8.plot: Valt and Hoji face off, while Wakiya shows the other competitors why he is a force to be reckoned with.

9.title: Wyvron in the Way!
9.plot: The gang meets a musical Blader and Wakiya lures Valt to his mansion for an unofficial battle.

10.title: Get Over It! Trust in Valtryek!
10.plot: After a humiliating battle against Wakiya, Valt becomes obsessed with winning.

11.title: Spryzen's Despair!
11.plot: Valt finds out about Shu's predicament as the semi-finals are set to begin.

12.title: Shield Crash Menace!
12.plot: Valt's fierce battle against Wakiya continues, and Shu takes on Orochi Ginba.

13.title: Shu's Test!
13.plot: Orochi puts up a fierce fight as Shu's shoulder continues to bother him.

14.title: The Battle We Promised!
14.plot: Valt finds himself torn between fulfilling a promise and protecting his friend.

15.title: A Fierce Battle! Valtryek Versus Spryzen!
15.plot: The final match of the District Tournament heats up between Valt and Shu.

16.title: A Group Lesson! Shakadera Special!
16.plot: On a trip to Xander's village, the gang finds it to be full of ninja traps and interesting characters.

17.title: Extreme Xcalius!
17.plot: Xander shows off his skills with Xcalius, and the team tries to keep up with his intense training regimen.

18.title: Team Battle! It's Off the Hook!
18.plot: A hidden member of Xander's team steps out of the shadows.

19.title: Roktavor vs Unicrest!
19.plot: Rantaro takes on Ukio in the team battle while Ken has something important to reveal.

20.title: Bring It Together! Chain Launch!
20.plot: Ken steps up in the team battle to defend the Bey Club's honor.

21.title: A Battle of Friendship!
21.plot: Valt takes on Xander in the team battle final; one Beigoma team member has an emotional good-bye.

22.title: Valtryek Awakens!
22.plot: The gang is invited to compete in the runner-up Regional Tournament, where they have one more shot to make Nationals.

23.title: Lonely Doomscizor!
23.plot: Daigo fights against his dark side when a tough opponent tempts him to cheat.

24.title: Full Strength, for Real!
24.plot: Friends take on friends in the Regionals as Valt faces off against Rantaro and Hoji battles Wakiya.

25.title: The Mysterious Masked Blader!
25.plot: A poorly-disguised Zac takes on the Beigoma Bladers as the mysterious Masked Blader.

26.title: Let's Do This Thing! On to Nationals!
26.plot: A guilty Daigo makes amends while Valt must find a way to beat Orochi in the A-block finals if he is to score an invitation to Nationals.

27.title: Training Camp! The Biting Stadium!
27.plot: With Wakiya joining the Beyclub, the team travels to his cabin for a training retreat.

28.title: Mountains! Rivers! A Huge Stormy Adventure!
28.plot: While the team trains at Wakiya's cabin, Toko and Nika find themselves lost.

29.title: Eye on the Prize!
29.plot: Valt is invited to give the Athlete's Pledge at the Nationals, but first he must find his missing Bey.

30.title: The Winged Snake! Quetziko!
30.plot: The first round of the National Team Battles pits the Beigoma Club against Ice Blaze, and a familiar face.

31.title: Teachings of a Legend!
31.plot: After losing his battle to Quon Limon, a discouraged Valt tries to reconnect with Valtryek.

32.title: Cyclone Power!
32.plot: Zac invites the Beigoma team to a theme park where they meet the most powerful Blader in the country.

33.title: Mega Flames! Dual Sabers!
33.plot: The Beigoma Beyclub takes on the Sword Flames in the second round of the National Team Battles.

34.title: The Beasts Bare Their Fangs!
34.plot: Ken's back, with some new friends to challenge the Beigoma team in the semi finals.

35.title: Primal Attack! Beast Betromoth!
35.plot: It's Captain vs Captain as Valt clashes with Ben Azuki and Beast Betromoth.

36.title: Rideout Rising!
36.plot: The Beigoma film club tags along with the Beyclub for the day as they prepare for their big match against Rideout.

37.title: Next Stop, Team Finals!
37.plot: The team picks an unusual way to train on their last day before the final.

38.title: Battle to the Finish! Lost Lúinor!
38.plot: The Beigoma Beyclub collides with Rideout at the National Team Finals.

39.title: Into the Vortex! Lost Spiral!
39.plot: The showdown between Valt and Lui continues; one team emerges victorious.

40.title: All In! Going Solo!
40.plot: A strange scientist offers to measure Valt's launching technique before the National Individual Tournament begins.

41.title: Nepstrius' Trap!
41.plot: Valt faces off against mad scientist Naoki in the first round of individual competition.

42.title: Jumbo Jormuntor! The Venomous Snake!
42.plot: The gang is on edge when Shu's creepy first round opponent is rumored to play dirty.

43.title: Winged Launch!
43.plot: Zac has competition for the love of his fans; Valt has a rematch with Quon.

44.title: Roar! Battle of the Beasts!
44.plot: Two Beasts face each other in the second round; Gabe takes on Zac the Sunshine.

45.title: Spryzen vs Wyvron!
45.plot: Wakiya finally gets his shot at redemption when he is pitted against Shu.

46.title: Battle for the Top! Valt vs Xander!
46.plot: Valt must do something he has never done before: win against Xander.

47.title: Star Battle!
47.plot: Zac battles to maintain his title against an upstart pop star who looks to topple him.

48.title: Semi-Finals! Spin Versus Speed!
48.plot: Valt and Zac battle to decide who will move on to the final.

49.title: Old Rivals! Lui Versus Shu!
49.plot: Shu seeks to avenge last tournament's loss to Lui and honor his promise to meet Valt in the final.

50.title: Overthrowing the King!
50.plot: At long last, the battle to determine the winner of the National Individual Tournament begins.

51.title: Final Showdown! Victory Valtryek!
51.plot: In an explosive finale, the best Blader in the country will finally be decided.

1.title: To the World! Valkyrie's Evolution!!
1.plot: Valt heads to Spain to be with his new team and faces distractions upon arriving there.

imdb.plot outline: Elementary-school student Valt Aoi is crazy about Beyblade and is best friends with Shu Kurenai, who is a prodigy at the game and has been named to the national Beyblade tournament's final four. Inspired by his friend's accomplishment, Valt makes it his goal to reach the tournament himself. The first step on the road to the big leagues is to win his district tournament, which includes some tough opponents. As he makes his way up the ladder, Valt reaches new heights and extends his circle of friends, eventually -- unknowingly -- dreaming of becoming the best Blader in the world.
imdb.title: Beyblade Burst
plot: Elementary-school student Valt Aoi is crazy about Beyblade and is best friends with Shu Kurenai, who is a prodigy at the game and has been named to the national Beyblade tournament's final four. Inspired by his friend's accomplishment, Valt makes it his goal to reach the tournament himself. The first step on the road to the big leagues is to win his district tournament, which includes some tough opponents. As he makes his way up the ladder, Valt reaches new heights and extends his circle of friends, eventually -- unknowingly -- dreaming of becoming the best Blader in the world.
